Content.Title: Demo

Images.Alt: Gif of a player vs Easy AI

Text: All the AI were tested agasint each other at high speeds to determine which were better than others. The above demo is me attempting to play the Easy AI.

Content.Title: AIs
Text: Easy - Follows the ball at all times.
Normal - Goes were the ball would go if it didn't bounce.
Hard - Guesses where the ball will be when it gets back to its side.
Ultimate - Knows where the ball will be when it gets back to its side.
